amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Board of trustees; officers; body corporate; audit.
amendatorysection.para: The members of the Board of Trustees of the Nebraska State Colleges shall annually elect a president and vice president from among their own number. The board shall constitute a body corporate to be known as the Board of Trustees of the Nebraska State Colleges, and as such may sue and be sued, and may make and use a common seal and alter the same at its pleasure. The board shall also select a secretary. The State Treasurer shall be treasurer of the board by virtue of his or her office. A complete and comprehensive annual audit shall be made of the books, accounts, funds, records, and affairs of the board and each of the state colleges.
